description: The ORDER_STATUS table contains overtime single response orders information.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: Unique ID for this order record

columns.name: ORD_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUMBER
columns.description: The contact number of the orders record.

columns.name: CONTACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value for the contact type, such as "1" for "Ordered" or "2" for "Resulted"


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Ordered


Resulted


Canceled


Verify


Dispense


Return


Administration


Edited History


Credit


Add Refill


Fill Request


Prescription Transfer


Pend Verify


Waste


Waste Credit


Canceled Verify


Canceled Pend Verify


Canceled Dispense


Adjudication


Hospice Refill


Charge


Pend Autoverify Review


Canceled Return


Canceled Waste


Edit Infusion Rate


Pharmacy Sale

columns.name: ABNORMAL_YN
columns.description:
This Y/N flag reports Y if a result component in the order is reported as abnormal or N if the order is normal.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Abnormal


Normal

columns.name: ORDER_CREATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the person creating the order.

columns.name: RESULTING_PROV
columns.description: The name of the provider signing off on the results.

columns.name: LAB_TECHNICIAN
columns.description: The technician responsible for the order tests.

columns.name: RESULTING_LAB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the lab running the test.

columns.name: RESULTING_LAB_ID_LLB_NAME
columns.description: Interface laboratory name.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY
columns.description: The instant the record was last entered.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_EDIT
columns.description: The instant the record was last edited.

columns.name: RX_DISPENSE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pharmacy dispense code used for this order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RX_PAR_DOSES
columns.description: PRN par level number of doses

columns.name: CSN_FOR_ADD_REFILL
columns.description: This item only applies to refill orders. It stores the contact serial numbers of the patient visits where the refill order was modified.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_DATE
columns.description: The date a standard ambulatory order is scheduled for.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_TIME
columns.description: The time a standard ambulatory order is scheduled for.

columns.name: PROCEDURE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This column contains the unique notes record identifier of the note that resulted the narrative for the order.

columns.name: PROCEDURE_NOTE_DT
columns.description: This is the date for the procedure note that resulted the order.

columns.name: ERFLL_REQ_RFL_PRN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the time period for refills requested in the erefill.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PRN-2Yr


PRN-1Yr


PRN-Other

columns.name: ERFLL_APP_RFL_PRN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the time period for refills approved in the erefill.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ERFLL_REQ_RFL_PRN_C_NAME

columns.name: EREFILL_TO_PHM_ID
columns.description: Stores the link to the general use notes record containing the action message to the pharmacy.

columns.name: WET_READS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether this contact is created by Wet Reads. Used in ED Wet Reads pop-up form.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Wet Reads

columns.name: ROUTING_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the outcome of results routing for each resulting contact of order associated with this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Result not sent 


Primary notification suppressed, CC list and Care Team evaluated


Routed using only CC list and additional recipients


Routed using routing scheme


Routed using routing scheme and additional recipients


Routed using results routing rule


Routed using results routing rule and additional recipients


Routed using an override provider


Routed using the authorizing provider


Routed using the authorizing provider and additional recipients


Routed using the encounter provider


Routed using the encounter provider and additional recipients


Routing failure - routed via batch


Sent with a different order as part of a grouped result


Routed as a group with other orders


Primary notification suppressed, CC list evaluated except Care Team

columns.name: ROUTING_RULE_LEVEL
columns.description: The level at which the results routing rule used to determine recipients was specified. The possible levels are: Auth Prov, Auth Prov Primary Dept, Enc Dept, or System

columns.name: ROUTING_SCHEME_LINE
columns.description: The line of the results routing scheme that was executed to determine recipients for this result. If no line was executed, the value of the column will be the string "DEFAULT".

columns.name: ROUTING_INST_TM
columns.description: The date and time the order was resulted and routed.

columns.name: ROUTING_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user the result was routed to for this row.

columns.name: RIS_LET_TEMPLT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the SmartText record for a mammography result letter associated with this order.

columns.name: RIS_LET_TEMPLT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: ROUTING_CURSTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the current routing status for a resulting contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Result contact created


Routing started


Needs Chart Sync


Synced - Needs routing


Re-Routing attempted


Re-routing attempt failed


Routing Complete

columns.name: MAM_LIFETIME_RISK
columns.description: Patient's probability of getting breast cancer in a lifetime. Calculated using external formula.

columns.name: LAB_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the lab status value associated with each order contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In process


Preliminary result


Final result


Edited


Edited Result - FINAL

columns.name: OVRL_BREAST_DENS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Overall breast density. Entered when reading a mammography study.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Almost entirely fatty


Scattered fibroglandular density


Heterogeneously dense


Extremely dense


Unknown

columns.name: RIGHT_BREAST_DENS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Right breast density. Entered when reading a mammography study.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OVRL_BREAST_DENS_C_NAME

columns.name: LEFT_BREAST_DENS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Left breast density. Entered when reading a mammography study.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OVRL_BREAST_DENS_C_NAME

columns.name: MOST_SIG_MAM_FIND_C_NAME
columns.description:
This stores the most significant mammography finding as documented by a radiologist.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


None


Mass


Calcification


Architectural distortion


Asymmetries


Other

columns.name: IMG_DOUBLE_READ_C_NAME
columns.description:
This tracks if a double read was performed while resulting an imaging study, and if so, what type of double read was it.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes - standard views


Yes - additional views


Yes - both standard and additional views


Yes - NOS


Unknown

columns.name: CAD_USAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This stores whether CAD (Computer Aided Detection) was used while interpreting an imaging study.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes - standard views


Yes - additional views


Yes - both standard and additional views


Yes - NOS


Unknown

columns.name: LAB_PATHOLOGIST_ID
columns.description: The unique user ID of the pathologist that has responsibility for the current Anatomic Pathology order.

columns.name: RSLT_CNCT_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant in which a result contact is modified/filed to the system. Not to be confused with Result Date/Time, which is when the result was actually generated.

columns.name: RSLT_CNCT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user filing the result contact. For interfaces or Beaker Result Filing background job, this might be a generic user.

columns.name: RSLT_CNCT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores which entry point modified the result contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unknown

Result Orders Visit Navigator


Results Console Visit Navigator

Lab Auto Verification


Lab Manual Verification

Donor Organ Editor

Link Health Maintenance


Dermatology Exam


Automatically Reconciled Image Result


Interfaces


Transcription Utility


3rd Party Result Entry


Bulk Ordering Utility


Utilities

columns.name: IPROC_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID to the general use notes record of the Imaging and Procedures Resulting Note.

columns.name: IPROC_NOTE_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number to the general use notes record of the Imaging and Procedures Resulting Note.

columns.name: RES_INTERPRETER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who is the interpreter of the results for this order.

columns.name: RESPONS_AP_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the lab user that has responsibility for the current anatomic pathology order.

columns.name: OVRL_TISSUE_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient level tissue composition. Entered when reading a breast US.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Homogeneous background echotexture - fat


Homogeneous background echotexture - fibroglandular


Heterogeneous background echotexture

columns.description:
Right breast tissue composition. Entered when reading a breast US.

columns.name: LEFT_TISSUE_COMP_C_NAME

Left breast tissue composition. Entered when reading a breast US.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OVRL_TISSUE_COMP_C_NAME

columns.description:
Patient level amount of fibroglandular tissue. Entered when reading a breast MR.

Scattered fibroglandular tissue

Right breast amount of fibroglandular tissue. Entered when reading a breast MR.

Left breast amount of fibroglandular tissue. Entered when reading a breast MR.

Patient level background parenchymal enhancement. Entered when reading a breast MR.

 Category Entries: 


Minimal


Mild


Moderate

columns.description:
Right breast background parenchymal enhancement. Entered when reading a breast MR.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OVRL_BPE_C_NAME

columns.description:
Left breast background parenchymal enhancement. Entered when reading a breast MR.

columns.description:
Symmetric flag for background parenchymal enhancement. Entered when reading a bilateral breast magnetic resonance (MR).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Symmetric


Asymmetric

columns.name: LAB_CORR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of correction that was made to an anatomic pathology report.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Addendum


Correction

columns.name: RESULT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the technician ran the tests for each order in calendar format. NOTE: Concatenates the result date (ORD 26) and result time (ORD 28) into a datetime format. If the time value is null, the query will return 12:00 AM for a time.

columns.name: LEFT_OVARY_SMALL_FOLLICLE_CNT
columns.description: The number of follicles in the left ovary at or below the minimum threshold as defined in system definitions (I LSD 53002).

columns.name: RIGHT_OVARY_SMALL_FOLLICLE_CNT
columns.description: The number of follicles in the right ovary at or below the minimum threshold as defined in system definitions (I LSD 53002).

columns.name: ENDOMETRIAL_STRIPE
columns.description: The measurement of the endometrial stripe.

columns.name: OV_CYST_PRESENCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether ovarian cysts are present in this ultrasound study.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Present


Present


Not Evaluated

columns.name: UTERINE_FIBROID_PRESENCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether uterine fibroids are present in this ultrasound study.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OV_CYST_PRESENCE_C_NAME

columns.name: UTERINE_POLYP_PRESENCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether uterine polyps are present in this ultrasound study.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OV_CYST_PRESENCE_C_NAME

columns.name: NARRATIVE_PERF_ORG_INFO
columns.description: This item stores the line number of the performing organization related group (ORD 1220) and acts as a pointer to the performing organization information of narrative of the result.

columns.name: IMPRESSION_PERF_ORG_INFO
columns.description: This item stores the line number of the preforming organization related group (ORD 1220) and acts as a pointer to the performing organization information of impression of the result.

columns.name: EXT_DISP_FILL_IDENT
columns.description: Holds the unique identifier for a given fill used to identify the external dispense

columns.name: SR_VALID_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the study has been properly updated and validated for a particular order, and is ready for enhanced validation from outside of Study Review. Validated [1] means that the study is ready for enhanced validation. Not Validated [0] or blank means that it is not ready, usually because the study was modified from outside of Study Review, or has never been opened in Study Review.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Validated


Validated
